newsitem.title: LIBYA: African ministers tell Israel to halt settlements.
newsitem.headline: African ministers tell Israel to halt settlements.

text.p: African foreign ministers urged Israel to halt the building of new settlements on occupied Palestinian land and said this could destroy the Middle East peace process.

"The Council (of African ministers)...urges Israel to immediately halt its confiscation of Palestinian territory and the construction of new settlements, especially in Jerusalem and in its environs," they said in a decision adopted late on Friday at the end of an Organisation of African Unity annual conference in Tripoli.
"The council expresses grave concern and condemnation of the Israeli government's violations of the principles of peace and peaceful co-existence," it added.
